objects.description:
PREREQUISITES:
-----
* There should be at least two contacts in the address book fulfilling any of the matching rules. 
Each contact should have the same company name associated.
objects.name: Verify that when merging if the suggested contact's company is the same, it is discarded

steps.instruction: 1. Open the address book
Select one contact and open the details view

steps.expected: ER1. Contact fulfilling any of the matching rules with the contact's from where the 'Find duplicate contacts' was launch is suggested as duplicate.
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Find duplicate contacts' option (ER1)
Select the contact shown as suggested duplicate

steps.expected: ER2. The company of the suggested contact is discarded. All other information merges correctly.
steps.instruction: Tap on merge (ER2)

objects.description:
PREREQUISITES:
-----
* Two contacts already in the address book 
One: with last name wich is shorter than the second contact's name 
Second: last name which contains a sub string of the first contact's name 
i.e.: 
First: Name=Maria, Last Name=Sand 
Second: Name=Maria, Last Name=Sandler 
Contacts have other field in common fulfilling any of the matching rules (i.e. both contact has the same phone number)
objects.name: Verify that when merging if the suggested contact's last name is longer than the original contact's last name, it is not overwritten

steps.instruction: Open the address book
Select first contact and open the details view

steps.expected: Second contact with the same number than the contact's from where the 'Find duplicate contacts' was launch is suggested as duplicate.
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Find duplicate contacts' option
Select the contact shown as suggested duplicate

steps.expected: The first contact's last name is not overwritten with the second's last name and all the rest of the information merges correctly
steps.instruction: Tap on merge

objects.description:
PREREQUISITES:
-----
* Two contacts should be created in the address book. 
One with name matching the beginning of the sequence of the second contact's name, the last name should be exactly the same, i.e: 
One contact: 'Christopher Smith' 
Second contact: 'Chris Smith'
objects.name: Verify that contact(s) which name is contained in the original contact name, will be suggested as duplicates

steps.instruction: Open the address book
Select the contact with longer name (first contact) and open the details view

steps.expected:
ER1. If there is a match between the beginning sequence of characters of the first name and the last name associated to any other contact in the contact list is the same, these contacts within the contact become suggestions. 
'Christopher Smith' will pick up 'Chris Smith' as a possible duplicate from the contact list.
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Find duplicate contacts' option (ER1)

objects.description:
Prerequisite:
Install webaudio as privilege app
       1.  Run "git clone https://github.com/zapion/webaudio.git" (don't need to run this step if you already have one)
        2. Start an app-manager in firefox desktop (nightly will be better). Open a blank page and type "about:app-manager" in url field
        3. Click "Apps" on the sidebar, and then "Add Packaged App"
        4. Find the directory cloned by git
        5. Make sure your phone is connected
        6. When "webaudio" showed in right hand side, click "update"

objects.description:
User can see contact photos on correct incoming call.

Prerequisite:
1. For CDMA phone only, make sure you have CDMA account under CDMA network.
2. Please make sure CDMA test account has call waiting enabled. You can check with carrier for more detail of how to enable it.
objects.name: [CDMA][Call waiting] Verify contact photo (First caller has contact photo, second call has not)

steps.instruction: Save a contact A with picture, contact B has not.

steps.expected: Dialer has correct caller name, number and photo of contact A during dialing or incoming call notification and after call is connected.
steps.instruction: Make a call to contact A or MT call to DUT from contact A.

steps.expected: 1. Second incoming call information is displayed on UI with only caller name and number of contact B but no picture of it. 2. Audio indicator can be heard from receiver.
steps.instruction: MT a second call from contact B to DUT.

steps.expected: 1. First call will be on hold. 2. There is a switch button on dialer and no caller names, numbers and photos.
steps.instruction: Answer the 2nd incoming call.

objects.description: The aim of this test case is to verify that the format of the data usage graph is correct when never billing period is selected.
objects.name: Verify the format of the graph is correct for never billing period

steps.expected:
1. When Never is selected as reset report period, (from first time) it starts at 0 at very left, with month reset graph. Today date continues until day 21 on the chart, then stops... and only the dates on the bottom changes everytime the date changes.
- Never reset from mid period (before day 21):
If Never is selected as reset report period, and date is BEFORE day 21 of
monthly calendar.. graph stays the same. Usage continues until day 21 of monthly calendar, and then as days progress only the dates change on the month calendar axis and graph history disappears.
- Never reset from mid period (after day 21):
If Never is selected as reset report period, and date is AFTER day 21 of
monthly calendar, the graph shifts back to day 21 point of month and dates change on axis.
steps.instruction: 1. Once cost control FTE is completed and never billing period is selected, open data usage details view

tags.description:
If this is the "Keyboard" test suite, you should have the "UI Test App".  Install it as follows:

1. Connect to the internet on your phone via WiFi or Data. 
2. Go to http://mozqa.com/webapi-permissions-tests/ in your B2G Browser.
3. scroll down to "Packaged App Test Case 13"
4. Click "Install Packaged App" button on the page.
5. The "UI Test" app should appear on your homescreen.

(Please disregard this step if this is "Keyboard & Text Handling" or any other suite).

objects.description:
* See: https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Customizations for detailed setup instructions
* User Story:
* As an OEM, I want to be able to specify which voicemail number should be used on the device based on the MNC/MCC setting from the SIM card inserted during the First Run Experience in order to target customizations to locales without needing to use separate builds.

* TWO SIM CARDS W/ DIFFERENT MNC/MCC COMBINATION
* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Firefox\_OS/Developing\_Gaia/Market\_customizations\_guide
* https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Customizations#Note
* http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobile\_country\_code
objects.name: Voicemail number should draw carrier preference if SIM Card inserted

steps.instruction: Insert the carrier SIM card, and power on the phone.  Pass the FTE.

steps.expected: Voicemail number is set to the carrier specified VM number (the one associated with the SIM card, or mcc|mnc pair.)
steps.instruction: Launch Settings app. Go to call settings, voicemail, and check the voicemail number.

steps.expected: In logcat, a call is shown as initiated to the carrier specified VM number.
steps.instruction: Call voicemail.

objects.description:
User Story:
As a user, when I swipe down the play icon on the status bar I want the utility tray to display the current song playing, album art

Acceptance Criteria:
1. If the user finds the play icon on the status bar and decides to take some action, he/she can swipe the notifications icon or swipe down from the top of the screen. This action opens up the utility tray with details of the current song at the bottom of the utility tray 
2. The utility tray should display the song playing, the album art and the music icon 
3. The user by selecting the song in the utiity tray can go to the music app to take some action

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=902974
objects.name: [Music] Controls: Verify the utility tray shows current song playing when the play icon is selected

steps.expected: A set of controls show at the bottom of the screen.
steps.instruction: Open the Music app and select a track to play from the Music Home screen.

steps.expected: The track should start playing and you should see a pause button render in the UI.
steps.instruction: Press the Play button to begin playing the track.

steps.expected: The Play icon should be visible in the status bar.
steps.instruction: Press the Home button to return to the Home screen.

steps.expected: The notifications tray should open and show details of the current song at the bottom of the screen. The utility tray should display the song playing, the album art and the music icon.
steps.instruction: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open up the notifications tray.

steps.expected: Takes the user back to the music app.
steps.instruction: Select the song playing in the utility tray.

steps.expected: "Tone selector" is triggered.
steps.instruction: Under Tones tap the change button for Alerts

steps.expected: The item selected is played.
steps.instruction: Tap on a list item in the "tone selector"

steps.expected: The selected alert is  changed - it is the one you choose from the list.
steps.instruction: Select Done.

objects.description:
testing the flow of the download descriptor

Implementation bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=905856
objects.name: [Forward Lock] Confirm Download Descriptor when downloading an audio file

steps.expected: A test page should successfully load.
steps.instruction: Using the browser on the device, navigate to http://djf.net/t.html.

steps.expected: Confirm Prompt to install as ringtone or song.
steps.instruction: Select the first link.

steps.expected: A dialog opens up asking you to download the ringtone. There is a description underneath the file details that indicates the media has been locked. There is also a "Download" and "Cancel" button present.
steps.instruction: Select Ringtone.

steps.expected: A progress bar opens up and shows the progress as the item is downloaded. After the download is complete, a preview screen should open up which allows you to either install the media or cancel. Audio previews allow the user to listen to the first half of the song or the first 5 seconds, whichever is longer.
steps.instruction: Select Download.

steps.expected: You should receive a confirmation screen indicating the Ringtone has been downloaded and installed. That ringtone will now be the default ringtone on your device.
steps.instruction: Select Install.

* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Firefox\_OS/Developing\_Gaia/Market\_customizations\_guide
* https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Customizations#Note
* http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobile\_country\_code
objects.name: Test that Data Settings should should draw carrier prefs SIM available after switching SIM cards

steps.expected: Then APN, Identifer, Password, HTTP proxy host, HTTP proxy port, MMS proxy, MMS port and MMSC set to the carrier-specific values for that SIM card.
steps.instruction: When I Launch Settings app, and go to call settings=>Cellular and data=>Data settings, and check the following values: APN, Identifer, Password, HTTP proxy host, HTTP proxy port, MMS proxy, MMS port and MMSC

steps.expected: Then APN, Identifer, Password, HTTP proxy host, HTTP proxy port, MMS proxy, MMS port and MMSC set to the carrier-specific values for that second SIM card.
steps.instruction: When I switch SIM card and restart the phone, and then launch aunch Settings app, and go to call settings=>Cellular and data=>Data settings, and check the following values: APN, Identifer, Password, HTTP proxy host, HTTP proxy port, MMS proxy, MMS port and MMSC

objects.description:
UCID: FM-006
User Story:
As a user of a device with large internal memory, I want to be able to transfer files to my device's internal memory via USB so that I can effectively utilize available memory to store files for later use on the device.
Prerequisites:  device is connected via USB to a computer
objects.name: Test that [usb storage] it's possible to enable and disable USB storage

steps.expected: Then device is available as a USB drive on the computer.
steps.instruction: When I go to Settings and Enable USB storage and then click OK to prompt

steps.expected: Then device is no longer available as a USB drive on the computer
steps.instruction: When I disable USB storage

objects.description:
Settings=> media storage
UCID: FM-006
User Story:
As a user of a device with large internal memory, I want to be able to transfer files to my device's internal memory via USB so that I can effectively utilize available memory to store files for later use on the device.
objects.name: Test that [usb storage], it's possible to set default media storage to internal

steps.expected: Then pictures, videos, files and music are saved to internal storage of the device.
steps.instruction: When I go to settings=>media storage => advanced and change 'Default media location' to internal storage, and take a picture, create a video, download a file or save a music file to the device

objects.description:

steps.expected: Then pictures, videos, files and music are saved to SD Card of the device.
steps.instruction: When I go to settings=>media storage => advanced and change 'Default media location' to SD card, and take a picture, create a video, download a file or save a music file to the device

objects.description:

User Story:
As a user of a device with large internal memory, I want to be able to transfer files to my device's internal memory via USB so that I can effectively utilize available memory to store files for later use on the device.

Long press the Home button and kill the app

steps.expected: The warning message appears every time when opening the Camera app
steps.instruction: Launch the Camera app again

objects.description:
* User Story:
* As an OEM, I want to be able to specify which A-GPS APN, Identifer, Password, HTTP proxy host and HTTP proxy port should be used on the device based on the MNC/MCC setting from the SIM card inserted during the First Run Experience in order to target customizations to locales without needing to use separate builds.

* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Firefox\_OS/Developing\_Gaia/Market\_customizations\_guide
* https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Customizations#Note
* http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobile\_country\_code

objects.description:
User story:

As a user I want to be informed with a simple screen when a call has ended.

Acceptance Criteria:

AC9.1 I want the call ended modal screen not to contain any detailed information than simple text saying "call ended".

AC9.2 I want this information to be displayed for 2 seconds after the call has ended.

AC9.3 when in a conference call I want only the message to display when last participant has left the call or in as the conf call owner, hang up the call.
objects.name: [Dialer] Display a message at the end of an MO call

steps.instruction: Make an MO call

steps.expected: A text should display the call is ended for 2 seconds
steps.instruction: End the MO call
